pages.text: Sky spells can be found in Villages

pages.title: Propel
pages.text: Launches the user in the air for a short distance $(li)Mana Cost: 10

pages.title: Gust
pages.text: Shoots a gust of wind that pushes back the target  $(li)Mana Cost: 20

pages.title: Thunder Strike
pages.text: Strikes lightning down upon the target's head $(li)Mana Cost: 30 $(li)Range: 15
